description.raw:
* Added jobs to test the ABI from different eigen versions
* Support for specific branches in the -any- job (designed to be integrated with PRs mechanism)

Jobs generated:

* ABI checking for [two eigen vesions](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/eigen3-abichecker-333_to_33beta1-xenial-amd64/)
* ABI checking [PCL with two eigen versions](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/pcl_eigen3-abichecker-333_to_33beta1-xenial-amd64) 
* [Drake build, install, test \+ particle test](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/drake-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64/)
